channel.title: How do you make urself owner/admin
channel.description:
i created a server and everything but when i go to the "characters" area its blank and iv searched all over for an area to make myself admin but i cant find it
so could somone tell me were i can find a place to make myself admin
(i have source pksc4p3 v3.6)
or tell me the code to make myself admin and were to put the code
+ rep to who ever helps me first or has the best explanation
i also need a coder so tell me if ur interested

item.title: How do you make urself owner/admin
item.dc:creator: @balla balla
item.description:
@balla wrote:

so whats a good source to get?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2008, 07:30:07 PM[/size][hr]nono i gotta good compiler and it saved my file on characters so now what?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2008, 07:37:04 PM[/size][hr]nvm i got it ty everyone

item.title: How do you make urself owner/admin
item.dc:creator: @99str3ngth99 99str3ngth99
item.description:
@99str3ngth99 wrote:

go to ur characters, find ur name

then go to ur character rights and change them to 3 from 0

0= normal
1= mod
2= admin
3= owner
4= hidden admin

Read full topic

as in it shud be players rights =0 chaneg it to 1 for mod 2admin 3owner 4hidden admin
